place.name: TRALLONG
place.gazetteerText: TRALLONG, a parish in the district and county of Brecon; 5 miles W by N of Brecon r. station. Post town, Brecon. Acres, 3,384. Real property, £1,995. Pop., 278. Houses, 55. An ancient British fort is at Twyn-y-Gaer. The living is a p. curacy in the diocese of St. Davids. Value, £59. Patron, the Bishop of St. D. (In 1870-72, John Marius Wilson's Imperial Gazetteer of England and Wales)
